Paragraph: CONCLUSION : Testosterone administration ameliorates STZ - and castration - induced memory impairment in male Wistar rats .

In this paragraph, the diseases are referred to as "STZ-induced memory impairment" and "castration-induced memory impairment." These phrases describe memory impairment that is caused by STZ (Streptozotocin) and castration, respectively.
